name: OM Game Free
description:
First time in Karnataka we are presenting Shivanna’s OM Kannada Movie based new official premium game! All Bangalore criminal Underworld dons targeted Satya (Shivanna) who accidently introduced to underworld by Madhu (Prema), when he was in love with her. Now there is no other choice for you to play as Satya with the familiar Long and start fight with Underworld dons, finish them all! As the dons attacking from opposite way and hence timely hit enemies incase if you miss then they will injure you. Avoid obstacles on your ways and swipe screen to control your movements. Collect coins and Gypsy Jeep power up for adding more score. Play again and again to make high scores and challenge your friends to show the power of Shivanna in you! Enjoy this endless running pakka local game with the Shivarajkumar’s real fight actions!
Let’s recall the Upendra’s super hit movie OM with the mass action of Shivarajkumar!

Features:
1. First Kannada movie based premium game
2. Never Ending game
3. Gypsy power up for adding up score
4. Mass game
5. Captured real actions and implemented in the game
6. 3D retro graphics
